name: James Rollins
bio:
James Rollins, #1 NYT bestseller. 
📖 Unveils unseen worlds. 
🧪 Scientific breakthroughs. 
📚 Historical secrets matched with stunning suspense.

social_posts.post_text: Didn’t have to go to the gym today. Had enough of a workout clearing the cabin deck after the big Sierra storm. Before and after shots of my handiwork.

Celebrate home for the holidays - a story told by my sister, Carrie.

👉Link in Bio👈

Got an early Christmas present this week. A very nice review from Booklist for CRADLE OF ICE, the second book in the Moonfall Saga: "The writing is gorgeous, textured and full of detail…and the world and its inhabitants are beautifully crafted. For lovers of fantasy fiction, a must-read.”
📚
The book hits shelves on February 7th, and below is a list of tour stops. And YES, there will be a Launch Party at the first stop on that list—at the Poisoned Pen—where again there will be a unique special insert included with purchase for those who preorder or attend the event at their store.
📚
Here’s a link if you’d like to preorder a signed & doodled copy, along with the exclusive insert:
📚
👉Link in Bio👈
I hope everyone has wonderful holiday season with friends and family. What’s your plans for the day?

I hope everyone has a joyous, healthy, and prosperous New Year. Our family’s Polish tradition is to consume pickled herring on New Year’s Eve to help ensure good luck in the coming year. Charlie is already looking forward to it. What’s your traditions to herald the new year?

I am sending out a newsletter on Saturday, January 7th, 2023.
📚
If you would like to receive a copy, signup for my newsletter here.
📚
👉Link in Bio👈
At CES, exploring for new gadgets for the Sigma team (or maybe a new TV for me).

We’re about a month off from the release of THE CRADLE OF ICE, the second book in the Moonfall Saga.
📚
I’ll be doing a coast-to-coast book tour, but there’ll be a book launch party at the first stop—the Poisoned Pen in Scottsdale.
📚
To commemorate the event, any sale or preorder will not only be signed and doodled, but will also come with a special exclusive insert on heavy card stock. It features a tinted version of the cover and a stylized picture of the story’s world (see below).
📚
If you’d like to preorder your own copy with the insert, click here.
📚
👉Link in Bio👈

My great friend @BradMeltzer’s new book THE NAZI CONSPIRACY is out today! Ken Burns called it a “riveting page turner.” And I agree. While it’s nonfiction, it reads like a thriller, involving assassination plots and shocking twists. It’s available here: https://amzn.to/3ZfoAQt

THE STARLESS CROWN hit shelves in a large & handsome trade paperback format. And I just learned that THE CRADLE OF ICE was picked by AARP on their roundup of best new books for winter (and of course, I agree with such an assessment). If you’ve not had a chance to join me on this new journey, the paperback of the first book is on shelves now! Echo is clearly more interested in her Kong frozen treat—but she tolerated my intrusion.
📚
👉Link In Bio👈

Just received the Exclusive Insert for THE CRADLE OFI CE, which will be given away with purchase of the book at the launch party at the Poisoned Pen— the first stop on the book tour. I’m very excited to share this next installment of the Moonfall Saga with you all!  The exclusive insert is available for those who pre-order thru the Poisoned Pen or attend the event in person. Click below to get a signed and personalized copy of the book, along with the special insert!
📚
👉Link In Bio👈

#thecradleofice

2023 is the Year of Ice and Fire! THE CRADLE OF ICE (Book 2 of the MoonFall saga) hits stores in a couple weeks. But out this summer comes the next big Sigma thriller—TIDES OF FIRE. I’m excited to share the cover reveal of that new Sigma blockbuster. More details to come in the months ahead!
📚
Preorder 👉Link in Bio👈

The first book in the MoonFall Saga—THE STARLESS CROWN—featured sketches of a dozen or so beastly inhabitants of this fantastical world. Book Two—THE CRADLE OF ICE—continues this tradition. I thought I’d tease one of the sketches (drawn by the talented Danea Fidler) found in the new book—debuting in two weeks on February 7th!

In case you missed it on my website, I thought I’d share the “book trailer” video for THE CRADLE OF ICE. Just something to tease the release of the second book in the MoonFall saga (hitting shelves on February 7th). I’m also dusting off my luggage for the upcoming book tour. First stop will be at the Poisoned Pen in Scottsdale—where the launch party will feature an exclusive insert with each signed (and doodled) copy. If you can’t attend the event of February 6th, but you like to secure a personalized copy, along with the insert, please preorder here: 👉Link in Bio👈

Took down the luggage to start packing for the CRADLE OF ICE book tour. Echo is already mourning Dad’s departure. Charlie’s wondering if it’s a new chew toy. Hope to see everyone out on the road! First stop is tomorrow (Feb 6th) in Phoenix @ the Poisoned Pen—where the Launch Event will include a special insert giveaway w/purchase from their store: 👉Link in Bio👈

Spent the afternoon pre-signing books at the Poisoned Pen in Scottsdale. Learned there might be a couple dogs at tonight’s event. The rowdier, the better. You can also follow the event on the store’s Livestream. And if you’d like to grab a copy from the stack of books I’m signing, click here: 👉Link in Bio👈

I had a great time at the Poisoned Pen launch event last night. Even met a new furry fan! Next up is my St. Louis stop, where I’ll be talking and signing books tonight at the very library (Ellisville Branch) which I used while growing up there. I wonder if they still have my library card on file?

Had a great time last night revisiting my old library branch in St. Louis with a wonderful crowd. Before I leave today, I plan on revisiting another spot. I grew up on the roast beef sandwiches here. (Next up on the tour: Murder by the Book tonight in Houston. See you all there!)

On a book tour, gotta expect the unexpected. Here in Austin, I was interviewed by a large shaggy puppet named Van for Texas libraries. I had fun. I’ll post the interview once it’s up. In the meantime, join me at BookPeople in Austin tonight at 7pm! See u all there!

I agree with #10 on this list, but even MORE for #4!! What series would you want to see made into a TV show?

10 Book Series That Would Make Great TV Shows

https://movieweb.com/books-great-tv-shows-should-be-adapted/

#theorderofthesanguines
Ah, the glamor of the road:  All ironed and wrinkle-free (mostly) for tonight’s book talk and signing @ the Boulder Bookstore at 7pm.

Had a special guest @ the Boulder Bookstore signing. Danea Fidler, the graphic artist who did all the fantastic sketches of creatures in the Moonfall series, was on hand to sign her work inside the books. It was an honor to have her on hand for this special event. Next up for me is my old hometown of Sacramento @ the Galleria B&N at 2pm. See you all there!

Heading into the air again. Join me at Page and Palette Bookstore in Fairhope, Alabama @ 6 pm tonight.

#thecradleofice

The Page and Palette bookstore left the lights on for me in Fairhope. Very handsome town. Now off to Florida for a talk & signing at the Downtown Orlando Library at 7:30pm. See u there!

#thecradleofice
@ Savannah Book Festival. Watching John Scalzi speaking. Wrote one on my favorite reads of this past year: The Kaiju Preservation Society

Had a wonderful time @ the Savannah Book Festival. Also wandered around & enjoyed the city’s beauty, from moss-shrouded oaks to night-lit mansions (like the pic I took below). Today I’m in Cleveland and will be speaking at the Hudson Library 6:30pm. See u all there!

#thecradleofice
Have the morning free in Cleveland. Trying to work off my breakfast at the hotel fitness center. How are you spending this President’s Day?

Settled back at home with the dogs! Thanks to everyone who joined me on this CRADLE OF ICE tour. For those that missed me, I did leave behind small stacks of signed & doodled editions at each location. I also confirmed that Poisoned Pen in Scottsdale has a small reserve of the same—which ALSO include the exclusive insert for this release. They can be still ordered here for a limited time:
📚
👉Link in Bio👈
Went out for a post-book tour celebratory dinner with some friends. Saw this sign. Gotta appreciate the honesty of it.
I’ll be speaking @ WonderCon in Anaheim this Friday and Saturday. Looking forward to seeing everyone and browsing thru the show floor. I’ll share some pics of what I find out there!

Enjoying my 1st trip to WonderCon: wild costumes, fun crowds, enthusiastic vendors. I spoke to a great group yesterday and spent WAY too much at the dealers’ tables. Looking forward to today’s panel, but maybe I’d better leave my wallet at the hotel.
Sometimes you have to say enough is enough and take off your glasses, close your laptop, and take a nap (that’s April, a new houseguest for a couple weeks)

Great news! BN.com is discounting preorders of the digital versions (Nook and Digital Audio) of the next big Sigma blockbuster, TIDES OF FIRE—a story I describe as a “disaster movie in novel format”. And now these digital versions are discounted an additional 25% off for the next 3 days using the code PREORDER25. Available here: 👉Link in Bio👈

#TidesofFire
A record-breaking snowy winter is melting away, revealing crushed branches and broken trees in the yard. Lots of clean-up to go. But at least I have a helper willing to give a hand—or claw.

In the past, I’ve usually waited a month after a book’s publication to ask a big favor. But with THE CRADLE OF ICE being such a huge book, I waited a bit longer. Reviews by readers (whether on Amazon or Goodreads or elsewhere) truly help a book gain attention. So if you have the time or inclination, posting a review for CRADLE helps a lot. Thanks again for the many years of support! You all are the best!

I’m excited for August—when TIDES OF FIRE hits bookshelves. Kirkus Reviews gave it a wonderful review today: "There’s plenty of brisk action in this undersea yarn...A solid Sigma Force adventure that’s sure to please thriller fans." I hope you all think so, too!

OUT TODAY: JAKE RANSOM SEIERS READER'S GUIDE
📚
In 2012 I released two free reader's guides. In 2021 I updated these guides to include my entire bibliography of work.
📚
Starting today and in the coming weeks leading up to the release of the next Sigma Force adventure, Tides of Fire. I will publish 7 FREE new and updated reader's guides.
📚
Come back to your social media and look for one of my posts to let you know the next reader's guide installment to download for free.
📚
You can get your copy via my website here: https://jamesrollins.com/reader-guides/ 👉Link in Bio👈
📚

TIDES OF FIRE will be hitting bookstores in 2 short months (August 15th). It’s one of the biggest, wildest Sigma stories I’ve ever attempted. The book trailer offers some hint to what I’m talking about. I can’t wait to get this story into everyone’s hands!
📚
Preorder now 👉 link in bio👈
📚
#tidesoffire

Here’s the official book tour schedule for TIDES OF FIRE! I’m looking forward to seeing everyone out on the road. I’m excited to get this new thriller into everyone’s hands. It’s very explosive! So much destruction.

#tidesoffire

They’ll be an EXCLUSIVE giveaway at the @poisonedpenbookstore launch party. Details to come, but it’s very cool! Think Sandstorm…care to guess what it might be? It’ll be limited to preorders at their store & attendees of the event. 

👉 link in bio 👈Order early: https://store.poisonedpen.com/item/YHsfyCIcKaXSWLy7Bijp8g

#TidesOfFire

I always struggle figuring out the signing doodle for a new book. For TIDES OF FIRE (out August 15th), I think I burned through a couple trees worth of paper. Was it worth it?

#tidesoffire

SPECIAL GIVEAWAY! For those who attend the Launch Party of #TIDESOFFIRE @poisonedpenbookstore on Aug 14 (or preorder from their store), you’ll get an extra bonus. Not only will the book be signed & doodled, but it’ll include a unique LENTICULAR bookmark. What's “lenticular”? The 1st Sigma book—Sandstorm—came with a cool lenticular (3-D-ish) cover. The bookmark will be like that—only with new art (photos to come!). To give a hint, I tried to capture the old lenticular cover of Sandstorm below. To get this limited-edition bonus bookmark, preorder Tides of Fire here: 👉Link in Bio👈

Exciting to get my hands on the first copies of TIDES OF FIRE—but more excited to get this book into all of your hands. BTW, over the next couple days, I’ll be sharing small details and tidbits about the book as we lead up to the launch on August 15th. And I have to say:  Beautiful cover for such an apocalyptic novel. What do you think?

Want to know a little more about TIDES OF FIRE? One of the issues that the new Sigma book addresses is the privatization of scientific exploration—which made recent headlines with the tragic implosion of a sub exploring the Titanic. In the new book, a billionaire funds a massive exploratory yacht that’s outfitted with state-of-the-art submersibles. What happens to them? TIDES OF FIRE will be out August 15th!”

Want to know more about TIDES OF FIRE? One of the questions that the new Sigma book tackles is a concern that has challenged Congress this past week:  Are we alone in the universe? And what secrets are some people keeping from us? Find out what I learned on August 15th in TIDES OF FIRE.

Want to a peek inside TIDES OF FIRE? Thought I’d share the schematics of the deep-sea station featured in the book: Titan Station. Want more details? Want to know how much damage Kowalski inflicts? Hint: It’s a LOT. Learn more on August 15th!

#tidesoffire

I posted the schematics from TIDES OF FIRE. Thought I’d share the actual ship that plays a BIG role in the story. It’s based on the Earth 300 research vessel that will be plying the seas soon.
📚
OH, and speaking of cool art, the Launch Party giveaway—a lenticular 3D bookmark—with purchase or preorder of the novel @poisonedpenbookstore is getting near its limited run of availability. Secure your copy of the signed book with the free gift here: 👉a link in Bio👈 or https://store.poisonedpen.com/item/
📚
#tidesoffire

WOW. I just saw a video of the new lenticular bookmark/postcard that will be this year’s giveaway at the Poisoned Pen’s launch party next Monday. It captures the beauty of the flickering image. Rotate one way, you get the skyline. Flip it a bit, and  you get a new overlaid image. Stunning!  It’s free with purchase or preorder exclusively at the Poisoned Pen: 👉Link in Bio👈 or https://store.poisonedpen.com/item/YHsfyCIcKaXSWLy7Bijp8g

#tidesoffire

I got a tiny snippet of the audio edition of TIDES OF FIRE, just a few lines (see below). l’m always impressed with a narrator’s ability, but for me, whenever I listen to one of my books being read aloud, my internal editor goes “Wait! I want to change that line!”
📚
The entire book is available from Audible here: 👉Link in Bio👈 or https://www.audible.com/pd/Tides-of-Fire-Audiobook/B0C69Z84XH
📚
#tidesoffire

I had a great time in Scottsdale at the @poisonedpenbookstore ! Off this morning to Houston and looking forward to seeing everyone at @murderbooks !

A Big thank you to Summer, Julie, and the UK Headquarters gang for the birthday gift bag. Welsh chocolate! And a cool flask! What should I fill it up with (after I eat the chocolate, of course)

#TidesofFire

Finished the book tour, celebrated my b-day yesterday, and got a great gift this morning: a wonderful review of TIDES OF FIRE from Ray Palen @ bookreporter.com <http://bookreporter.com/>: "To say that TIDES OF FIRE is intense and suspenseful would be a gross understatement. This is thriller/adventure writing of the highest order…an outstanding, high-octane read that will make you look at the world around you from a different point of view."

So thrilled I could kick off the Fall Author Series at the Des Moines Public Library! Thank you to everyone who drove from all over the midwest. This was such a great evening! 

@withregram @desmoineslibrary Last night was our very first event of the Fall Author Series with James Rollins moderated by local author Joseph Levalley! Fans drove from all over the midwest, and  a couple from Cedar Rapids even brought almost all of James Rollins' books for him to sign.

Now published in 40 territories outside the United States, here is a look back at the international covers for Sandstorm, The Explosive first adventure in James Rollins’ bestselling Sigma Force series! A freak explosion in the British Museum in London ignites a perilous race for an earth-shaking power source buried deep beneath the sands of history. Painter Crowe is an agent for Sigma Force, a covert arm of the Defense Department tasked with keeping dangerous scientific discoveries out of enemy hands. When an ancient artifact points the way toward the legendary “Atlantis of the Sands,” Painter must travel across the world in search of the lost city–and a destructive power beyond imagining. But Painter has competition. A band of ruthless mercenaries, led by a former friend and ally, are also intent on claiming the prize, and they will destroy anyone who gets in their way. Ancient history collides with cutting-edge science–with the safety of the world at stake!

Thanks for sharing and adding to your reading list @iamauthoret! 

@withrepost @iamauthoret Happy #ThrillerThursday everyone!

In this latest riveting thriller from James Rollins, the #1 New York Times bestselling author of the Sigma Force series, an international research station in the Coral Sea comes under siege during a geological disaster that triggers massive quakes, deadly tsunamis, and volcanic eruptions.

Thank you, Partner @bibliolifestyle @williammorrowbooks for the #gifted copy. 

It was published on August 15, 2023.

SYNOPSIS: 

To stop the world from burning, it’s up to Sigma Force to uncover a secret buried at the heart of our planet. 

The Titan Project—an international research station off the coast of Australia—discovers a thriving zone of life in an otherwise dead sea. The area teems with a strange bioluminescent coral that defies science, yet holds great promise for the future. 

But the loss of a military submarine in the area triggers a brutal attack and sets in motion a geological disaster that destabilizes an entire region. Massive quakes, volcanic eruptions, and deadly tsunamis herald a greater cataclysm to come—for something is stirring miles under the ocean, a threat hidden for millennia.

As seas turn toxic and coastlines burn, can Sigma Force stop what has been let loose—especially as an old adversary returns, hunting them and thwarting their every move? For any hope of success, Commander Gray Pierce must search for a key buried in the past, hidden deep in Aboriginal mythology. But what Sigma could uncover is even more frightening—something that will shake the very foundations of humanity.

Predictive text:  The world is on fire, so let’s __________ .

I don’t typically show my dachshund 🐾 in book-related photos. My reading buddy is very accustomed to having books around, so he just refused to move for the photo. He may be tiny, but he is fast and stubborn. 😂 

❔Do you have a reading buddy?

About the book:
📘 Tides of Fire (Sigma Force #17)
✍️ James Rollin
📄 448 pages
Published on August 15, 2023
William Morrow Books

Blurb:
In the latest riveting thriller from James Rollins, the #1 New York Times bestselling author of the Sigma Force series, an international research station in the Coral Sea comes under siege during a geological disaster that triggers massive quakes, deadly tsunamis, and volcanic eruptions. To stop the world from burning, it’s up to Sigma Force to uncover a secret buried at the heart of our planet. 

The Titan Project—an international research station off the coast of Australia—discovers a thriving zone of life in an otherwise dead sea. The area teems with a strange bioluminescent coral that defies science, yet holds great promise for the future. But the loss of a military submarine in the area triggers a brutal attack and sets in motion a geological disaster that destabilizes an entire region.

Massive quakes, volcanic eruptions, and deadly tsunamis herald a greater cataclysm to come—for something is stirring miles under the ocean, a threat hidden for millennia.

As seas turn toxic and coastlines burn, can Sigma Force stop what has been let loose—especially as an old adversary returns, hunting them and thwarting their every move? For any hope of success, Commander Gray Pierce must search for a key buried in the past, hidden deep in Aboriginal mythology. But what Sigma could uncover is even more frightening—something that will shake the very foundations of humanity.

Here is a look back at the international covers for Deep Fathom! Ex-Navy SEAL Jack Kirkland surfaces from an aborted underwater salvage mission to find the Earth burning. Solar flares have triggered a series of gargantuan natural disasters. Earthquakes and hellfire rock the globe. Air Force One has vanished from the skies with America’s president on board. Now, with the U.S. on the narrow brink of a nuclear apocalypse, Kirkland must pilot his oceangoing exploration ship, Deep Fathom, on a desperate mission miles below the ocean’s surface. Their devastating secrets await him – and a power an ancient civilization could not contain has been cast out into the modern day. And it will forever alter a world that’s already racing toward its own destruction. 


#JamesRollins #AuthorJamesRollins #Author #Read #Books #DeepFathom
#FBF to the time that I shared my story of perseverance with I Went Camping With. 49 agents told me no before I got my yes.

Happy Monday! I hope your weekend was filled with lots of reading with your fur babies 📚

In the latest riveting thriller from James Rollins, the #1 New York Times bestselling author of the Sigma Force series, an international research station in the Coral Sea comes under siege during a geological disaster that triggers massive quakes, deadly tsunamis, and volcanic eruptions. To stop the world from burning, it’s up to Sigma Force to uncover a secret buried at the heart of our planet. 

The Titan Project—an international research station off the coast of Australia—discovers a thriving zone of life in an otherwise dead sea. I'm excited to read this because earthquakes and volcanoes really interest me.
🌋Have you ever experienced an earthquake or volcano?

I was here when Mt. St. Helens erupted with ash and for the Nisqually quake, which was a 6.8. Pretty exciting stuff!

𝙏𝙝𝙚 𝙨𝙚𝙘𝙤𝙣𝙙 𝙗𝙤𝙤𝙠 𝙞𝙣 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙉𝙚𝙬 𝙔𝙤𝙧𝙠 𝙏𝙞𝙢𝙚𝙨 𝙗𝙚𝙨𝙩𝙨𝙚𝙡𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙈𝙤𝙤𝙣𝙛𝙖𝙡𝙡 𝙨𝙚𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙨 𝙛𝙧𝙤𝙢 𝙩𝙝𝙧𝙞𝙡𝙡𝙚𝙧-𝙢𝙖𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙧 𝙅𝙖𝙢𝙚𝙨 𝙍𝙤𝙡𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙨, 𝙏𝙝𝙚 𝘾𝙧𝙖𝙙𝙡𝙚 𝙤𝙛 𝙄𝙘𝙚 𝙞𝙨 𝙖 𝙥𝙖𝙜𝙚-𝙩𝙪𝙧𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙩𝙖𝙡𝙚 𝙤𝙛 𝙖𝙘𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣, 𝙖𝙙𝙫𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙪𝙧𝙚, 𝙗𝙚𝙩𝙧𝙖𝙮𝙖𝙡, 𝙖𝙢𝙗𝙞𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣, 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙨𝙩𝙧𝙪𝙜𝙜𝙡𝙚 𝙛𝙤𝙧 𝙨𝙪𝙧𝙫𝙞𝙫𝙖𝙡 𝙞𝙣 𝙖 𝙝𝙖𝙧𝙨𝙝 𝙬𝙤𝙧𝙡𝙙 𝙩𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙝𝙖𝙣𝙜𝙨 𝙗𝙮 𝙖 𝙩𝙝𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙙.⁣
⁣
To stop the coming apocalypse, a fellowship was formed.⁣
⁣
A soldier, a thief, a lost prince, and a young girl bonded by fate and looming disaster.⁣
⁣
Each step along this path has changed the party, forging deep alliances and greater⁣
enmities. All the while, hostile forces have hunted them, fearing what they might⁣
unleash. Armies wage war around them.⁣
⁣
For each step has come with a cost—in blood, in loss, in heartbreak.⁣
⁣
Now, they must split, traveling into a vast region of ice and to a sprawling capital of the world they’ve only known in stories. Time is running out and only the truth will save us all.⁣
⁣

All the international covers for The Doomsday Key: A Sigma Force Novel. 📚 Have you read this one yet? If not, read on for the synopsis! 
At Princeton University, a famed geneticist dies inside a biohazard lab. In Rome, a Vatican archaeologist is found dead in St. Peters Basilica. In Africa, a US Senator’s son is slain outside a Red Cross camp. Three murders on three continents bear a horrifying connection: all the victims are marked by a Druidic pagan cross burned into their flesh.

The bizarre murders thrust Commander Gray Pierce and Sigma Force into a race against time to solve a riddle going back centuries, to a ghastly crime against humanity hidden within a cryptic medieval codex. The first piece of the puzzle is discovered inside a mummified corpse buried in an English peat bog-a gruesome secret that threatens America and the world.

Aided by two women from his past–one his ex-lover, the other his new partner–Gray must piece together the horrifying truth. But the revelations come at a high cost, and to save the future, Pierce will have to sacrifice one of the women at his side. That alone might not be enough, as the true path to salvation is revealed in a dark prophecy of doom.

Sigma Force confronts humankind’s greatest threat in an adventure that races from the Roman Coliseum to the icy peaks of Norway, from the ruins of medieval abbeys to the lost tombs of Celtic kings. The ultimate nightmare is locked within a talisman buried by a dead saint–an ancient artifact known as the Doomsday Key.

Scroll for absolute cuteness Posted @withregram • @lacollezionistadilibri__ “questo mondo è troppo duro anche per una donna fatta di metallo”

In foto potete ammirare un'esemplare di Winnie che non mi lascia leggere 🐾

👑 Questo è il primo fantasy di James Rollins, conosciuto per i suoi romanzi d'avventura, la copertina mi ha invogliata sin dal primo momento e non vedevo l'ora di parlarvene!

👑 World building: la costruzione di questo mondo è notevole e ambiziosa, ogni creatura che lo popola è descritto nei minimi particolari e accompagnato da illustrazione che offrono al lettore un'idea delle loro sembianze. Il sistema magico è diverso da quelli a cui siamo abituati e per questo estremamente affascinante.

👑Personaggi: la trama ruota attorno a tre personaggi principali, ben distinti ma con un destino comune che li porterà sempre più vicini pagina dopo pagina. Non hanno un minuto di pace sin dall'inizio ma sono caratterizzati alla perfezione nella loro diversità.

👑 È un romanzo con tanti elementi che spaziano dalla scienza, all'alchimia, segreti storici, intrighi politici, torture e profezie di rovina.
Allo stesso modo i temi trattati vanno dal bullismo al tradimento, suicidio, perdita, sacrificio etc. 
Se siete interessati vi invito a prestare attenzione a questi particolari poiché è un libro più che esplicito nel descrivere le azioni di chi è disposto a tutto per sete di potere e conoscenza.

👑 Questo libro è il primo della serie Moon Fall e io mi auguro di cuore di avere presto il seguito!

The Map of Bones International covers. Have you read this one yet? The bones lead to ancient mysteries and present-day terror . . . To follow them means death. During a crowded service at a cathedral in Germany, armed intruders in monks’ robes unleash a nightmare of blood and destruction. But the killers have not come for gold; they seek a more valuable prize: the bones of the Magi who once paid homage to a newborn savior . . . a treasure that could reshape the world. With the Vatican in turmoil, Sigma Force under the command of Grayson Pierce leaps into action, pursuing a deadly mystery that weaves through sites of the Seven Wonders of the World and ends at the doorstep of an ancient, mystical, and terrifying secret order. For there are those with dark plans for the stolen sacred remains that will alter the future of humankind . . . when science and religion unite to unleash a horror not seen since the beginning of time.

🔥Tides of Fire🔥
Author: James Rollins
Pub Date: August 15, 2023

Thank you @bibliolifestyle @williammorrowbooks for partnering with me and this #gifted book! 

What it’s about:

🪸The Titan Project—an international research station off the coast of Australia—discovers a thriving zone of life in an otherwise dead sea. The area teems with a strange bioluminescent coral that defies science, yet holds great promise for the future. But the loss of a military submarine in the area triggers a brutal attack and sets in motion a geological disaster that destabilizes an entire region.

🌋Massive quakes, volcanic eruptions, and deadly tsunamis herald a greater cataclysm to come—for something is stirring miles under the ocean, a threat hidden for millennia.

🌊As seas turn toxic and coastlines burn, can Sigma Force stop what has been let loose—especially as an old adversary returns, hunting them and thwarting their every move? For any hope of success, Commander Gray Pierce must search for a key buried in the past, hidden deep in Aboriginal mythology. But what Sigma could uncover is even more frightening—something that will shake the very foundations of humanity.

💭Sounds like the perfect end of the world or save the world type of book! 

👏🏻What is the most fun activity you’ve ever done on vacation?

Love meeting my readers and fellow authors and it is even better when I find out I was able to inspire them in some way! #FBF 

@withrepost @scribe_and_read 
My day was so so until this evening at the book signing for James Rollins at the @poisonedpenbookstore OMG! James is definitely the first author I drew much inspiration from! I learned so much from his story that he shared and the advice he gave me! I almost cried because I’ve been struggling to find my way in this writing world. So to hear how many rejections he got before he finally published his fantasy novel was soo inspiring for me! I have a new drive or boost to keep writing even in the face of rejection because all I need is one yes! James Rollins you rock! @poisonedpenbookstore you rock! And thank you again for my complimentary book for my birthday!

To stop the coming apocalypse, a fellowship was formed.

A soldier, a thief, a lost prince, and a young girl bonded by fate and looming disaster.

Each step along this path has changed the party, forging deep alliances and greater
enmities. All the while, hostile forces have hunted them, fearing what they might
unleash. Armies wage war around them.

For each step has come with a cost—in blood, in loss, in heartbreak.

Now, they must split, traveling into a vast region of ice and to a sprawling capital of the world they’ve only known in stories. Time is running out and only the truth will save us all.

@withrepost @pagesofpeace 🏝️Deep Fathom by James Rollins🏝️ Former Navy SEAL, Jack Kirkland, surfaces after an underwater mission to discover parts of the world have faced massive destruction following a series of solar flares. Air Force One has gone down in the middle of the ocean and a new city has been discovered in the Pacific. His team uncovers how these two are connected while they race to stop the world from its own destruction. 

James Rollins was one of the first authors I fell in love with back in high school. I read this one several years ago but decided to revisit it while attempting to clear my shelves. Rollins books are packed with suspense and just enough historical elements that make you feel like they could actually happen one day. I thoroughly enjoyed rereading this book and can’t wait to experience the others I have by him all over again.
